overview: Stage registration of the tenth show by the Flemish cabaret duo Kommil Foo. 'Lof der Zotheid' is an amalgam of songs, stories, and circus acts. Mich is sawn in 2 on stage, a cacophony of kitchen-, garden- and household utensils accompanies an insane story about the apocalypse, shadow puppetry with two hands, a sheet and a spotlight and a handful of sensitive love songs complete the work.
title: Kommil Foo: Lof der Waanzin
